title: Krushna Abhishek:Bigg Boss 13: Krushna Abhishek Is Angry Over Siddharth Dey’s Cheap Comments For Arti Singh, Wants To Confront Him
text:
Bigg Boss 13: Krushna Abhishek Is Angry Over Siddharth Dey’s Cheap Comments For Arti Singh, Wants To Confront Him

Bigg Boss 13: Krushna Abhishek Is Angry Over Siddharth Dey’s Cheap Comments For Arti Singh, Wants To Confront Him

Sometimes people lose their control while they performing tasks on reality TV show Bigg Boss. People have gone to different extremes in the past too, but what happened recently was simply not cool.

tosshub.com

During a task, contestant Siddharth Dey went a bit too far and passed rude and personal comments on Arti Singh, which didn’t go down well with fans as well as her brother and popular comedian Krushna Abhishek.

That fucking #SiddharthaDey used unappropriate words for #ArtiSingh in national TV.

Such a gutterchap and idiot person n now no girls are raising their voice against him just because he is there in their team . Such hypocrisy.#Arti gave right back to that loser ,#BiggBoss — Gajal. (@Gajal_Dalmia) October 18, 2019

Stay strong #ArtiSingh

I know you handle this situation but I'm so sad to see your face...how can he using that type word such a cheap mentality

Your aggression Tottaly justify...#BB13 — Team Arti Singh (#BB13) (@AartiSinghFC) October 18, 2019

Whattaa cheap guy #SiddharthDey.. shame on him.. disgusting language useing for ~#ArtiSingh #BiggBoss13 — your Sayan (@Sayan31110972) October 18, 2019

Don't Miss 3.1 K SHARES 1.3 K SHARES 249 SHARES 1.5 K SHARES 330 SHARES

Disappointed and angry with Siddharth Dey’s comments, Krushna Abhishek said that he would want to speak to him directly.

Twitter

"I'm shocked that Siddharth Dey could do this. He knows me and my family. How could he do this to a woman? How could he do this to my sister? Of course, I will confront him. Arti is my sister. I may even go to the show and ask him in front of Bhai (Salman Khan) that what was all that about," he was quoted as saying by Spotboye.

Twitter

Siddharth Dey, meanwhile, has apologised to Arti Singh on the show. He accepted that his behaviour during the task was uncalled for. He was apologetic and said that he didn’t intent to say such bad things. Even Salman Khan has criticised him in the last episode.

Twitter

In tonight’s episode of Bigg Boss 13, two of these three contestants -- Paras Chhabra, Siddhartha Dey and Abu Malik – will be eliminated. Who, in your opinion, should get evicted and why, tell us in the comment section below.
description: Disappointed and angry with Siddharth Dey’s comments for Arti Singh during Bigg Boss 13's recent task, Krushna Abhishek said that he would want to speak to him directly. He added that he would want to go on the show and confront him in front of Salman Khan.
